trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_000<tab>An ijin traveler? What are you doing here? If you are looking to cross into Kugane, you need go further east.
TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_010<tab>I am one of the many bakufu soldiers stationed here, charged with patrolling the waters surrounding Hingashi.
TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_011<tab>I hail from Koshu─the largest of the many islands that make up our great nation.
TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_012<tab>For the next three years I will be serving at this post and shall do whatever is required of me to fulfill my duty here.
TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_020<tab>This is the Ruby Price─a Hingan bastion erected by the bakufu in the middle of the Ruby Sea.
TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_021<tab>Whenever an enemy ship draws too near, we fire upon them until nothing but burning planks remain.

TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_022<tab>We must take extra precautions when doing so, however, as we are stationed very close to the trading port of Kugane. We do not want to mistakenly open fire on a commercial or otherwise friendly vessel.
TEXT_REGOTH3THERUBYPRICE_00406_TSURUGI_000_023<tab>Such an error would be akin to waging war upon what may have been an allied or neutral nation.
